member.name: T:Uhuru.CloudFoundry.Server.MSSqlNode.MSSqlOptions
member.summary: This is a class containing information about connecting to an MS Sql Server.

member.name: P:Uhuru.CloudFoundry.Server.MSSqlNode.MSSqlOptions.Host
member.summary: Gets or sets the host for connecting to the service.

member.name: P:Uhuru.CloudFoundry.Server.MSSqlNode.MSSqlOptions.User
member.summary: Gets or sets the user for connecting to the SQL Server.

member.name: P:Uhuru.CloudFoundry.Server.MSSqlNode.MSSqlOptions.Password
member.summary: Gets or sets the password for connection to the SQL Server.

member.name: P:Uhuru.CloudFoundry.Server.MSSqlNode.MSSqlOptions.Port
member.summary: Gets or sets the port for connection to the SQL Server.

member.name: T:Uhuru.CloudFoundry.Server.MSSqlNode.Node
member.summary: This class is the MS SQL Server Node that brings this RDBMS as a service to Cloud Foundry.

member.name: M:Uhuru.CloudFoundry.Server.MSSqlNode.Node.ServiceName
member.summary: Gets the service name.

member.name: M:Uhuru.CloudFoundry.Server.MSSqlNode.Node.Start(Uhuru.CloudFoundry.ServiceBase.Options)
member.summary: Starts the node.
member.param: The configuration options for the node.

member.name: M:Uhuru.CloudFoundry.Server.MSSqlNode.Node.Start(Uhuru.CloudFoundry.ServiceBase.Options,Uhuru.CloudFoundry.Server.MSSqlNode.MSSqlOptions)
member.summary: Starts the node.
member.param: The configuration options for the node.

member.name: M:Uhuru.CloudFoundry.Server.MSSqlNode.Node.Provision(Uhuru.CloudFoundry.ServiceBase.ProvisionedServicePlanType)
member.summary: Provisions an MS Sql Server database.
member.param: The payment plan for the service.

member.name: M:Uhuru.CloudFoundry.Server.MSSqlNode.Node.Provision(Uhuru.CloudFoundry.ServiceBase.ProvisionedServicePlanType,Uhuru.CloudFoundry.ServiceBase.ServiceCredentials)
member.summary: Provisions an MS Sql Server database.
member.param: The payment plan for the service.

member.name: M:Uhuru.CloudFoundry.Server.MSSqlNode.Node.Unprovision(System.String,Uhuru.CloudFoundry.ServiceBase.ServiceCredentials[])
member.summary: Unprovisions a SQL Server database.
member.param: The name of the service to unprovision.
Array of bindings for the service that have to be unprovisioned.
member.returns: A boolean specifying whether the unprovision request was successful.

member.name: M:Uhuru.CloudFoundry.Server.MSSqlNode.Node.Bind(System.String,System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.Object})
member.summary: Binds a SQL Server database to an app.
member.returns: A new set of credentials used for binding.

member.name: M:Uhuru.CloudFoundry.Server.MSSqlNode.Node.Bind(System.String,System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.Object},Uhuru.CloudFoundry.ServiceBase.ServiceCredentials)
member.summary: Binds a SQL Server database to an app.
member.returns: A new set of credentials used for binding.

member.name: M:Uhuru.CloudFoundry.Server.MSSqlNode.Node.Unbind(Uhuru.CloudFoundry.ServiceBase.ServiceCredentials)
member.summary: Unbinds a SQL Server database from an app.
member.param: The credentials that have to be unprovisioned.
member.returns: A bool indicating whether the unbind request was successful.

member.name: M:Uhuru.CloudFoundry.Server.MSSqlNode.Node.Restore(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Restore a given instance using backup file.
member.returns: A bool indicating whether the request was successful.

member.name: M:Uhuru.CloudFoundry.Server.MSSqlNode.Node.DisableInstance(Uhuru.CloudFoundry.ServiceBase.ServiceCredentials,Uhuru.CloudFoundry.ServiceBase.ServiceCredentials)
member.summary: This methos disables all credentials and kills user sessions.
member.returns: A bool indicating whether the request was successful.

member.name: M:Uhuru.CloudFoundry.Server.MSSqlNode.Node.DumpInstance(Uhuru.CloudFoundry.ServiceBase.ServiceCredentials,Uhuru.CloudFoundry.ServiceBase.ServiceCredentials,System.String)
member.summary: Dumps database content into a given path.
member.param: The file path where to dump the service.
member.returns: A bool indicating whether the request was successful.

member.name: M:Uhuru.CloudFoundry.Server.MSSqlNode.Node.ImportInstance(Uhuru.CloudFoundry.ServiceBase.ServiceCredentials,Uhuru.CloudFoundry.ServiceBase.ServiceCredentials,System.String,Uhuru.CloudFoundry.ServiceBase.ProvisionedServicePlanType)
member.summary: Imports an instance from a path.
member.param: The file path from which to import the service.
member.returns: A bool indicating whether the request was successful.

member.name: M:Uhuru.CloudFoundry.Server.MSSqlNode.Node.EnableInstance(Uhuru.CloudFoundry.ServiceBase.ServiceCredentials@,System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.Object}@)
member.summary: Re-enables the instance, re-binds credentials.
member.returns: A bool indicating whether the request was successful.
